start.speaker: Village Elder
start.text: Greetings, brave adventurer! Our village is in great danger.

danger_explanation.speaker: Village Elder
danger_explanation.text: Goblins have been raiding our village at night, stealing our food and frightening our children. We need someone brave enough to deal with them.

choices.text: I'll help you deal with the goblins.
That sounds too dangerous for me.

help_request.speaker: Village Elder
help_request.text: If you could eliminate the goblin threat, we would be forever grateful. There are at least two of them lurking near the village outskirts.

choices.text: I need to think about it.

accept_quest.speaker: Village Elder
accept_quest.text: Thank you, hero! May the gods protect you on your journey. Return to me when the threat is eliminated.

decline_quest.speaker: Village Elder
decline_quest.text: I understand your caution. Perhaps another brave soul will come to our aid.

think_about_it.speaker: Village Elder
think_about_it.text: Take your time, but please don't take too long. Our village depends on it.

goodbye.speaker: Village Elder
goodbye.text: Safe travels, stranger. Our door is always open to you.

quest_complete.speaker: Village Elder
quest_complete.text: You've done it! The goblin threat is no more. Please accept this reward as a token of our gratitude.

choices.text: It was my pleasure to help.
